help me !!!

TIA.

usually an attribute is malformed because some part of the system was built with
one version of AspectJ and now you are using Ant with a different version of
AspectJ - is that possible in your case?  We ensure compatibility between
1.2/1.2.1 and 1.5.0 - so if you built some piece of code with 1.2.1 then 1.5.0
will understand it.  We dont guarantee compatibility between different builds of
1.5 - because the serialized form (in the attributes) is constantly changing
whilst we work on AspectJ - so if working with the latest dev build, you need to
recompile everything you are working with.

let me know.
No feedback, so presumed not a bug.
